content:
Motor Coach

Split Rock is a motor coach friendly destination and we welcome you to make the trip to stay with us in beautiful Lake Harmony, PA! We strive to give all motor coach groups the most memorable and exciting experience possible, whether you come on a day trip or for a whole weekend.

Split Rock offers motor coach packages that include:

  • Complimentary Bus Parking
  • Overnight Accommodations
  • Welcome Reception
  • Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner Options
  • Daily Activity & Recreation Program
  • Passes to H2Oooohh! Indoor Water park
  • And More!
  • Senior Day Trips

View our 2016 Bus Tour Info and Entertainment Schedule (PDF) for more information or call (888) 802-2348 and ask to speak with our sales department for more information.
